```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
library(vitae)
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)
source("Utils/data_download_funs.R")

CV <- create_CV_object(
  data_location = params$data_location,  
  pdf_mode = FALSE
)
```

# Profile
```{r, results='asis'}
CV %<>% print_profile() 
```


# Experience
```{r}
CV$entries_data %>% 
  filter(section == 'work_experience') %>% 
  detailed_entries(
    what = institution,
    when = glue::glue("{`start`} - {`end`}"),
    with = title,
    where = loc,
    why = description_bullets
  )
```
